title: T206 Frank Chance and Johnny Evers for sale
author: balltrash

posts.post_title: T206 Frank Chance and Johnny Evers for sale
posts.post_content:
Pair of noted Cubs Hall of Famers, each display nice and crisp color and well centered images.

Johnny Evers (With bat, Chicago on shirt, Piedmont 350 back) - card has wear including a heavier crease at top and some other lighter creases/wrinkles along with some corner/edge wear. As should be visible in the scan, back has a few very small dot indentations near bottom. $75

Frank Chance (Batting, Piedmont 350-460 back) - card has some light wrinkles and corner/edge wear. As should be visible in the scan, back has some discoloration. $85

Take both for $150 shipped. I can accept payment via paypal. Please PM with questions or to purchase.
